segments.text: Come on , Tara . Let ’ s go up to the window and buy two tickets . The movie is starting in a few minutes .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We can ’ t break into the line . Don ’ t be so impatient . We ’ ll be at the front of the line soon .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Two tickets , please . How much are they ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh no , Ari . I didn ’ t mean for you to pay for me when I invited you to go tonight . Let ’ s go Dutch . I ’ ll pay my own way . I insist .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I ’ m looking forward to this film . I read a good review of it in this morning ’ s newspaper .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Me , too . It will be great to see something light and funny for a change . I ’ m tired of heavy drama .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: They ’ re fine , but I can ’ t watch a movie without popcorn .
segments.speaker: S2
